title: To: “Imaging of an active fault: Comparison between 3D GPR data and outcrops at the Castrovillari fault, Calabria, Italy,”Ercoli Maurizio, Pauselli Cristina, Romana Cinti Francesca, Forte Emanuele, and Volpe Roberto,Interpretation,3, no. 3, SY57–SY66, doi: http://dx.doi.org/10.1190/INT-2014-0234.1
